mapper.select: SELECT subject_no subjectNo, subject_name subjectName, subject_createdate subjectCreateDate, subject_updatedate subjectUpdateDate, subject_totalday subjectTotalDay, subject_info subjectInfo FROM subject WHERE subject_no = #{subjectNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject ( subject_name, subject_createdate, subject_updatedate, subject_totalday, subject_info ) VALUES ( #{subjectName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{subjectTotalDay}, #{subjectInfo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET subject_name = #{subjectName}, subject_updatedate = NOW(), subject_totalday = #{subjectTotalDay}, subject_info = #{subjectInfo} WHERE subject_no = #{subjectNo}
